00032 IterativeClosestPoint::IterativeClosestPoint() {
00033         this->assigner = 0;
00034         this->estimator = 0;
00035         this->convergenceThreshold = 0.00001;
00036         this->maxIterations = 20;
00037 
00038         /* initial values fir stateful interface */
00039         this->model = 0;
00040         this->data = 0;
00041         this->intermadiateTransformation = 0;
00042         this->resultTransformation = 0;
00043 }
00044 
00045 IterativeClosestPoint::IterativeClosestPoint(IPointCorrespondence *assigner, IRigidTransformationEstimation *estimator, double convergenceThreshold, int maxIterations) {
00046         this->assigner = assigner;
00047         this->estimator = estimator;
00048         this->convergenceThreshold = convergenceThreshold;
00049         this->maxIterations = maxIterations;
00050 
00051         /* initial values for stateful interface */
00052         this->model = 0;
00053         this->data = 0;
00054         this->intermadiateTransformation = 0;
00055         this->resultTransformation = 0;
00056 }
00057 
00058 IterativeClosestPoint::~IterativeClosestPoint() {
00059         delete this->assigner;
00060         delete this->estimator;
00061 
00062         if (this->intermadiateTransformation != 0) { // might be unused
00063                 delete this->intermadiateTransformation;
00064         }
00065         if (this->resultTransformation != 0) { // might be unused
00066                 delete this->resultTransformation;
00067         }
00068 }
00069 
00070 void IterativeClosestPoint::match(PointCloud3D* model, PointCloud3D* data, IHomogeneousMatrix44* resultTransformation) {
00071         /*
00072          * Important note:
00073          * This method does not work on the member variables model and data, to prevent a mixture between the
00074          * stateless (IIterativeClosestPoint) and statefull (IIterativeClosestPointDatailed) interface
00075          *
00076          */
00077         assert(assigner != 0); //check if algorithms are setup
00078         assert(estimator != 0);
00079         assert(model != 0); // check input parameters
00080         assert(data != 0);
00081 
00082         double error = 0.0;
00083         double previousError = 0.0;
00084         double previousPreviousError = 0.0;
00085 
00086         IHomogeneousMatrix44* tmpResultTransformation = new HomogeneousMatrix44();
00087         std::vector<CorrespondencePoint3DPair>* pointPairs = new std::vector<CorrespondencePoint3DPair>();
00088 
00089         /* perform generic ICP */
00090         for (int i = 0; i < maxIterations; ++i) {
00091                 previousPreviousError = previousError;
00092                 previousError = error;
00093 
00094                 /* find closest points */
00095                 assigner->createNearestNeighborCorrespondence(model, data, pointPairs);
00096 
00097                 /* estimate transformation */
00098                 error = estimator->estimateTransformation(pointPairs, tmpResultTransformation);
00099 //              cout << "Estimated transformation: " << endl  << *tmpResultTransformation; //DBG output
00100                 *resultTransformation = *((*resultTransformation) * (*tmpResultTransformation)); // accumulate transformations
00101 
00102                 /* perform transformation on data point cloud */
00103                 data->homogeneousTransformation(tmpResultTransformation);
00104 
00105                 /* stop if error is below convergence threshold */
00106                 if ((std::abs(error - previousError) < convergenceThreshold) &&
00107                                 (std::abs(error - previousPreviousError) < convergenceThreshold)) {
00108                         LOG(DEBUG) << "ICP converged after " << i << " iterations. "; //DBG output
00109                         icpresultIterations = i;//benchmark only
00110                         break;
00111                 }
00112         }
00113 
00114         LOG(DEBUG) << "RMS Error is: " << error; //DBG output
00115         icpResultError = error;//benchmark only
00116         delete pointPairs;
00117         delete tmpResultTransformation;
00118 
00119 }

00144 void IterativeClosestPoint::setConvergenceThreshold(double convergenceThreshold)
00145 {
00146         if (convergenceThreshold < 0.0) {
00147                 throw runtime_error("ERROR: convergenceThreshold for ICP cannot be less than 0.");
00148         }
00149         this->convergenceThreshold = convergenceThreshold;
00150 }

00158 {

00160                 throw runtime_error("ERROR: maxIterations for ICP cannot be less than 0.");
00161         }
00162         this->maxIterations = maxIterations;
00163 }

00182 double IterativeClosestPoint::performNextIteration() {
00183         assert(assigner != 0); //check if algorithms are setup
00184         assert(estimator != 0);
00185         assert(this->model != 0); // check if data is set
00186         assert(this->data != 0);
00187 
00188         double error;
00189         if (this->intermadiateTransformation == 0) { // do only once
00190                         this->intermadiateTransformation = new HomogeneousMatrix44();
00191         }
00192         if (this->resultTransformation == 0) { // do only once
00193                         this->resultTransformation = new HomogeneousMatrix44();
00194         }
00195         std::vector<CorrespondencePoint3DPair>* pointPairs = new std::vector<CorrespondencePoint3DPair>();
00196 
00197         /*
00198          * perform one ICP iteration:
00199          */
00200 
00201         /* find closest points */
00202         assigner->createNearestNeighborCorrespondence(this->model, this->data, pointPairs);
00203 
00204         /* estimate transformation */
00205         error = estimator->estimateTransformation(pointPairs, this->intermadiateTransformation);
00206         //cout << "Estimated transformation: " << endl  << *tmpResultTransformation; //DBG output
00207         *(this->resultTransformation) = *((*(this->resultTransformation)) * (*(this->intermadiateTransformation))); // accumulate transformations
00208 
00209         /* perform transformation on data point cloud */
00210         this->data->homogeneousTransformation(this->intermadiateTransformation);
00211 
00212         delete pointPairs;
00213         return error;
00214 }
00215 
00216 IHomogeneousMatrix44*  IterativeClosestPoint::getLastEstimatedTransformation() {
00217         return this->intermadiateTransformation;
00218 }
00219 
00220 IHomogeneousMatrix44*  IterativeClosestPoint::getAccumulatedTransfomation() {
00221         return this->resultTransformation;
00222 }
